price: Sen ne kadar şiddetle arzu etsen de insanların çoğu iman etmezler.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
